review_text: Was buying for the Richmond Inn Richmond  tons and tons of poultry while I was the executive chef in the 80/90.s Had the best service ever! reasonable price and excellent quality today 2023 I am out of touch because left the mainland for international cruise lines for 15 years now retired . the boss was that time an excellent man probably now deceased. Hopefully his great spirit still there

The owners are terrific to deal with! They have great products for the best prices. Ive been purchasing chicken from them for years and I would never switch. I tried a couple other poultry plants a while back but I went running back to H&B.

The best poultry and meat wholesaler in the city! Such an amazing facility, really great staff and fantastic product quality. The only place I will order my meat from; and they have halal product! So happy I found this gem - highly recommend.
Really positive experience. Great service in combination with great product. Fresh poultry first time ordering in large quantities and was very happy with the price and quality received.

I just moved to Vancouver a couple years ago and ive been searching for a place like this. I bulk ordered chicken and the quality was unbelivable. The owners were super nice as well. I live downtown, but its definitely worth the trip. Enjoy!
Best meat supplier in the lower mainland. Everything is great quality and the customer service representatives always go above and beyond for my customized orders.
Very good prices , excellent service.I wish they open in the weekends as well
Good poultry and meats available mostly from New Zealand and Australia. They claim to be Halal. Price wise quite attractive.
Hb poultry is the great place to get halal products.  Also service is super. So happy to eat fresh product no complains.
The new retail space is incredible. Fantastic customer service and super fresh product. Definitely my new go to!
I never regretted buy from them,always fresh ,test meat,price also are great
Great place to get halal meats , my family has been coming here for years highly recommend it.
Good customer service. Fresh meat and poultry products. Keep up the good service.
Do you want FRESH, local, clean, halal chicken? Then look no further. Did I also say that its insanely cheap?
This place is great.  Been going here for a long time. Awesome prices.
Have been coming here for three years and always satisfied. Good friendly service and good rates.
I personally loved the place , really welcoming, good service and affordable
Great quality and great customer service!
Great staff, service and product.
H& B poultry  & meat the Best in Vancouver

H & B is a wholesaler for meat products. Their prices are half the price compared to the retail outlets. Ive found their product fresh and of good quality even if I buy frozen. I usually buy Cornish chicken, lamb, and goat from there but they have many other products, I dont think they have pork as they designate their product halal. Staff is always helpful and informative. You can buy in bulk or small amount depends on the product. If you dont live closeby then better phone them first, sometimes they may be closed and you may not know. Since they are wholesaler, they dont have any store front and dont expect beautiful decorated store, so for first time visitors it will be difficult to find where it is located. It is behind the strip mall area on Marine drive. You can enter the stores back side through Argyle st. There arent any signs, right after entering Argyle turn left and keep driving all the way to the end, youll notice a small sign on a back door saying h&b poultry. They have ample parking is there.
Good service and there is different kinds of meat every thing clean and the meat is fresh
If you care only about HAHAL, then bookmark this place. However, you might need to sacrifice the quality of the meat.

One of the drivers for this company was 1 inch from running me off the hiway doing 80-90 km with my child in the car. After cutting me off he continued to cut off about 5 more cars in the same way while tail gating others. Im not sure what kind of outfit this is, but their employees sure arent representing them professionally at all!! My only regret is not having my dash cam set up to send this into the police.

Honestly?...I guess the people that wrote the good reviews, must be apart of the family?.. Because when I places , my order it  wasnt what I received ?..And  when I had called too see what happened they told me that it was my fault, and that I should place my order rite next time...I did not at all receive proper service ..Anyone who does order from here should properly check out what the receive...I WILL NEVER ORDER from here again...

I bought some chicken just about a month ago, the chicken had this horrible smell and I had to throw the whole thing away!!! Not happy about this at all!!! Fraser Health has to go and check this place out because im sure there are a bunch of health issues and health hazards.

This a fraudulent company that under the cloak of Veterans Hospital and Canadian Federation of the Blind sell business listings in a bogus Journal. They use some mumbling old man on the phone to have you agree to let them send you something, which they assume is an agreement for a business listing. Should be ashamed.
